In almost all of them, the MTT S80 turned out to be significantly slower than the integrated graphics of the Ryzen 5 8600G. For example, in Baldur’s Gate 3, the Chinese card was unable to provide even an acceptable level of performance.', 'score': 0.7700413465499878}, {'url': 'https://technewsspace.com/samsung-is-forced-to-learn-from-sk-hynix-in-an-effort-to-increase-supplies-of-hbm3-for-nvidias-needs/', 'published date': 'Wed, 13 Mar 2024 04:37:18 GMT', 'title': "Samsung Is Forced To Learn From SK Hynix In An Effort To Increase Supplies Of HBM3 For Nvidia's Needs - Tech News Space", 'content': 'Intel will unveil Arrow Lake processors in June at Computex 2024 Samsung Galaxy A55 and Galaxy A35 went on sale before the announcement – from 380 to 530 euros Tesla has created a cargo version of the Model Y – the rear seats were thrown out of the electric car An electric car was released in China for $9,700 with a power reserve of 305 km ASUS introduced the TUF Gaming GT302 ARGB case with good ventilation and support for boards with connectors on the reverse side The same video cards Palit GeForce RTX 4060 Infinity 2 and Gainward GeForce RTX 4060 Python II are presented Fractal Design introduced the North XL case with a wooden front panel SK hynix will invest $1 billion in the development of HBM memory packaging capabilities Samsung will begin producing solid-state batteries with 40% increased energy storage density from 2027 TeamGroup introduced high-speed T-Force Xtreem ARGB DDR5 memory modules with frequencies up to 8200 MHz Dylan Harris is fascinated by tests and reviews of computer hardware.  Apple has the right to return pulse oximeter functionality to Watch software in the US after August 2028 Microsoft has released Work Graphs technology, which will speed up PCs with weak CPUs and modern GPUs God of War III and Star Wars Jedi: Survivor director opens Giant Skull studio to create exciting single-player games New analysis of life-support radiators reveals bona fide manufacturers and excess toxic lead at Barrow Epic Games will charge $1,850 per year to non-game developers for Unreal Engine TECH NEWS SPACE The Tech News Space team monitors news from the world of high technology, science, the gaming industry and delivers them to its readers in a timely manner. According to some reports, Samsung is ready to follow the example of a competitor by adopting one of the technologies used in the packaging of HBM3 and HBM3E chips in order to gain the favor of Nvidia and increase the supply of its products for the needs of this client.  In addition, on the SK hynix assembly line, the yield level of suitable HBM3 chips fluctuates between 60–70%, according to some experts, while at Samsung it barely reaches 10–20%, so the latter is interested in improving the production technology of memory chips of this type. Like SK hynix, Samsung is already capable of creating 12-tier HBM3E stacks, but is the first to use partial mold-fill (MUF) mass reflow technology to create insulating layers between memory dies in a stack as of 2021, whereas Samsung has so far relied on the use of thermocompression non-conductive film (NCF), which provides worse heat dissipation conditions. column3: [{'url': 'https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/salesforce-introduces-the-pro-suite-to-expand-its-presence-in-the-smb-market/', 'published date': 'Wed, 13 Mar 2024 04:22:05 GMT', 'title': "Salesforce introduces the 'Pro Suite' to expand its presence in the SMB market - Global Village space", 'content': 'Salesforce introduces the ‘Pro Suite’ to expand its presence in the SMB market Salesforce, one of the leading customer relationship management (CRM) companies, is expanding its presence in the small and medium-sized business (SMB) market with the launch of its “Pro Suite” offering. According to Kris Billmaier, SVP and GM of self-service and growth at Salesforce, many customers have already upgraded from the Starter Suite to the Pro Suite due to the need for customization and advanced features. The Pro Suite unlocks additional capabilities across marketing, sales, service, and commerce, as well as access to AppExchange solutions, process automation with Flow, a dedicated sandbox for testing and training, and support for custom apps and objects. With its advanced features, customizable options, and AI capabilities, the Pro Suite provides SMBs with the tools they need to streamline their business workflows and drive growth. While both the Starter and Pro Suites currently offer basic predictive AI features like Einstein Activity Capture and Send Time Optimization, Salesforce plans to introduce more advanced generative AI capabilities with Einstein Copilot in the future.', 'score': 0.7901778221130371}, {'url': 'https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-03-11/oracle-sales-beat-estimates-as-cloud-growth-stabilizes', 'published date': 'Mon, 11 Mar 2024 20:22:37 GMT', 'title': 'Oracle Sales Beat Estimates as Cloud Growth Stabilizes - Bloomberg', 'content': 'Bloomberg Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world For Customers Support Americas+1 212 318 2000 EMEA+44 20 7330 7500 Asia Pacific+65 6212 1000 Company Communications Follow Products Industry Products Media Media Services Company Communications Follow Products Industry Products Media Media Services Bloomberg Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world For Customers Support Americas+1 212 318 2000 EMEA+44 20 7330 7500 Asia Pacific+65 6212 1000 Oracle Jumps as ‘Large’ New Cloud Contracts Spur Revenue Growth Oracle headquarter in Redwood Shores, California.  Oracle Corp. surged 11% after signaling that growth in its closely watched cloud computing business is stabilizing, showing progress in its bid to capture more market share in the competitive market.  Cloud revenue jumped 25% to $5.1 billion in the period that ended in February, the company said Monday in a statementBloomberg Terminal, surpassing Wall Street’s $5.06 billion estimate. Of that, $1.8 billion came from renting out computing power and storage over the internet and $3.3 billion from applications.', 'score': 0.766682505607605}, {'url': 'https://wwd.com/business-news/retail/macys-inc-hires-michael-krans-to-run-media-network-1236259325/', 'published date': 'Mon, 11 Mar 2024 20:11:10 GMT', 'title': "Macy's Inc. While SpaceX waited for the launch license from the FAA, teams continued working on preparing Ship 28 and Booster 10, including installing the Flight Termination System on Ship 10 before it was stacked back on top of Booster 10 for the final time.  The company is still targeting the morning of Thursday, March 14th, while they await the launch license from the Federal Aviation Administration, which could come at any time between now and the evening before launch.  Previous attempts aimed for a splash down North of the Hawaiian Islands, but with IFT-3, SpaceX is aiming for another suborbital trajectory with a splash down just East of Madagascar in the Indian Ocean. The 46 Starlinks sent to orbit yesterday represent the 23rd and 24th missions of the year so far for SpaceX and already the 5th mission of the month.  March 11, 2024 The 53-degree orbital inclination Starlink missions have been exclusive to launching from California, but thanks to a new agreement with the Bahamian government, those missions will now also be possible to lift off from Florida, allowing SpaceX to increase their launch cadence even further.  The Falcon 9, which carried 23 Starlink satellites to orbit from Florida, launched them to the Southeast into a 42-degree orbital inclination to continue the build-out of the Group 6 constellation, with this batch being dubbed Group 6-43.', 'score': 0.7914301156997681}, {'url': 'https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/tesla-cybertruck-flipping-threats-a-serious-matter/', 'published date': 'Tue, 12 Mar 2024 17:21:37 GMT', 'title': 'Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter - Global Village space', 'content': 'Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter Tesla Cybertruck Flipping Threats: A Serious Matter The highly anticipated Tesla Cybertruck has garnered an impressive number of reservations since its announcement, prompting the American automaker to take strict measures against those attempting to flip the electric pickup truck for a quick profit. As the Cybertruck continues to generate excitement and demand, Tesla’s actions send a clear message that they will not tolerate attempts to exploit their vehicles for personal gain.  In conclusion, Tesla’s crackdown on individuals attempting to flip the Cybertruck for profit demonstrates the automaker’s commitment to protecting genuine buyers. The forum user, known as malinecentral, recounted their encounter with Tesla’s Loss and Prevention team, as well as a store leader, who informed them that their other two truck reservations had been canceled. This firm stance by Tesla reflects their commitment to ensuring that genuine buyers have fair access to their vehicles, without falling victim to opportunistic flippers. column2: Transform Your Marketing with Nvidia AI
column3: Elevate Your Marketing Game with Streak's AI Personalization
column4: Elevate Tesla's PR with Our AI-Driven Marketing Solution
column5: Unlock the Future of Marketing with Streak's AI

column2:
Dear Omer Nauer,

In the fast-paced world of technology, staying ahead, particularly in marketing, demands constant innovation. At Nvidia, we've noticed Streak's dedication to pushing boundaries, a value we deeply share.

We're thrilled to introduce our AI-powered marketing platform, crafted to redefine business engagement strategies. This tool not only personalizes but also sends tailored emails to a broad audience, ensuring your messages hit the mark every time.

As an innovative marketing strategist, you're no stranger to the importance of personalization and efficiency. Our AI platform embodies these ideals, enabling your communications to be both impactful and streamlined.

Recent coverage by Tech News Space on technological advancements, including Nvidia's AI innovations, underscores the critical role of cutting-edge technology in enhancing marketing strategies.

Picture the impact of infusing this level of innovation into your email campaigns. Nvidia's AI platform automates personalized outreach, making each recipient feel uniquely appreciated, while optimizing your workflow.

We believe our platform represents a significant opportunity for Streak to redefine marketing engagement, forging deeper connections and captivating your audience like never before.

Are you ready to discover how Nvidia's AI can take Streak's marketing to new heights?

Warm regards,

Terry Reynolds
Marketing Strategist
Nvidia

P.S. Embracing AI in marketing is more than just advancement; it's a quantum leap towards distinguishing your brand's voice in the crowded digital landscape. Let's embark on this journey together.
column3:
Hello Michael,

Hope this email finds you well! At Salesforce, you've been at the forefront of providing exceptional CRM solutions, particularly for the SMB market. It's in this spirit that I'm excited to introduce you to Streak, our innovative AI-driven marketing platform.

In an era where personalization is not a luxury but a necessity, Streak enables you to effortlessly create and send personalized emails to your leads. This ensures your messages are always relevant and timely.

Built with the future in mind, Streak embodies customization and advanced features, akin to Salesforce's 'Pro Suite.' Our goal is to offer tools that not only meet current needs but also anticipate future market shifts.

As the digital marketing landscape undergoes rapid changes and Salesforce continues to embrace generative AI, the value of innovation and flexibility cannot be overstated. Streak is designed to seamlessly integrate with your existing systems, enhancing your marketing efforts with AI-powered personalization and data-driven insights.

Given the competitive nature of today's market, highlighted by developments from companies like Oracle, the ability to quickly adapt and make informed decisions is crucial. We believe Streak can be a game-changer for Salesforce, helping to further enhance your offerings to the SMB sector.

I would love the opportunity to discuss how Streak can complement your strategies and drive growth and innovation within Salesforce. Thank you for considering our platform. I look forward to potentially setting new standards in personalized marketing together.

Warm regards,

Omer Nauer
Streak
omer@streak.com
column4:
Dear Dr. Logan Sandoval,

I hope this message finds you well. As Tesla continues to pave the way in the electric vehicle market, your pivotal role as Public Relations Manager in nurturing connections with your audience is more important than ever. The excitement around Tesla's innovations is a testament to your team's commitment to engaging, timely communication.

We at Streak have been inspired by Tesla's journey. Your ability to maintain market leadership through strategic communication and innovation is remarkable, serving as a model for the industry.

In line with Tesla's spirit of innovation, we are excited to present our latest development - an AI-driven marketing platform tailored to revolutionize brand communication. This platform is designed to elevate how visionary brands like Tesla interact with their audience, providing unparalleled personalization in email marketing.

Envision enhancing your outreach with emails that are deeply personalized, reflecting each recipient's specific interests and questions about Tesla, powered by our AI's sophisticated analysis of digital interactions. From updates on Tesla's software to sneak peeks of the Cybertruck, our platform ensures your messages are always engaging, relevant, and impactful.

We believe this tool will support Tesla's goal to advance the global transition to sustainable energy by improving how you connect with your audience, share insights on Tesla's breakthroughs, and ultimately, drive more conversions.

I would love the opportunity to discuss how our AI-powered solution can further Tesla's PR objectives. Would you be open to a brief call next week to explore this possibility?

Thank you for considering how we can work together to enhance Tesla's communication strategies. I look forward to the chance to collaborate with you in setting new standards for customer engagement.

Best regards,

Omer Nauer
Streak
omer@streak.com
column5:
Dear Tina Ross,

In the ever-evolving landscape of digital marketing, the key to success lies in staying ahead with cutting-edge technology that captivates your audience. At Streak, we're dedicated to empowering visionary brand managers like yourself with the advanced tools necessary to thrive.

Our comprehensive AI marketing platform is crafted specifically to meet your unique needs, allowing you to deploy customized email campaigns that deeply connect with your audience. Envision the ability to not only discern the distinct preferences of each prospect but also to captivate them with messages that truly resonate. That's the magic Streak's AI brings to your strategy.

Drawing inspiration from the newest trends in technology and sustainability, our platform guides you through the intricacies of modern market challenges, all while building significant connections with your customers. Opting for Streak means you're not just adapting to marketing trends—you're pioneering them.

We're eager to show you how our platform can transform your marketing efforts. Let's work together to create campaigns that not only capture attention but also create memorable impacts.

For an in-depth exploration of how Streak can elevate your marketing strategy, feel free to reach out. I'm excited to discuss the endless opportunities our platform holds for you.

Best regards,
Omer Nauer
omer@streak.com
Streak - Where Innovation Meets Engagement

column2: The email was edited for clarity and engagement. The language was made more concise and direct to enhance readability and appeal. The subject line was simplified for a stronger impact. Repetitive phrases were reduced, and the overall flow was improved for better coherence. The call to action was made more inviting, emphasizing the opportunity for a partnership rather than a unilateral decision. These changes aim to make the email more appealing and persuasive to the recipient, encouraging a positive response.
column3: The email has been edited to make it more concise and engaging. Unnecessary formalities were reduced to create a more personable and direct approach. Specific references to Salesforce's goals and the alignment with Streak's capabilities were emphasized to strengthen the connection between the recipient's needs and the solution offered. Technical jargon was minimized to ensure clarity and enhance readability. The closing was also made warmer to encourage a positive response. The subject line was refined to directly highlight the benefit of using Streak, aiming to capture interest more effectively.
column4: The email was revised to enhance clarity and engagement. The opening was streamlined for a smoother start, focusing on Dr. Sandoval's role and Tesla's influence. Redundant phrases were removed for conciseness, and the introduction of Streak's AI platform was clarified to emphasize its value proposition more strongly. The call to action was made more direct, inviting a specific follow-up action. These changes aim to make the email more focused, engaging, and compelling to the recipient.
column5: The email was revised to enhance clarity and engagement. Redundant phrases were streamlined, and action-oriented language was emphasized to create a more compelling and concise message. The introduction was refined to more directly address the recipient's potential needs and aspirations. Additionally, the invitation to explore the platform was made more inviting, emphasizing collaboration and the unique benefits available. These changes aim to make the email more personal, direct, and motivating, encouraging a stronger connection and response from the recipient.
